name: Buffalo Wild Wings, Inc.
description: Buffalo Wild Wings, Inc. is a prominent American casual dining restaurant and sports bar franchise known for its chicken wings, which are offered in a variety of sauces and seasonings. Founded in 1982 in Columbus, Ohio, by Jim Disbrow and Scott Lowry, the company has grown to become a favorite destination for sports fans and food lovers alike. Buffalo Wild Wings emphasizes a fun, vibrant atmosphere where guests can watch live sports on numerous screens while enjoying a diverse menu that includes appetizers, burgers, and salads. The restaurant chain prides itself on its 'Wings. Beer. Sports.' motto, providing an engaging experience for patrons. Buffalo Wild Wings also offers a robust takeout and delivery service, catering to customers who prefer to enjoy their meals at home. The company is committed to community engagement and often supports local sports teams and events. In addition to its food offerings, Buffalo Wild Wings has developed a loyalty program that rewards frequent diners, enhancing customer retention and satisfaction. With over 1,200 locations across the United States and beyond, Buffalo Wild Wings continues to expand its footprint in the casual dining sector, adapting to changing consumer preferences and trends in the food industry.
